title: If it is unsafe to eat fish from the Cape Fear river and other watersheds that provide drinking water to our towns and cities because of MERCURY contamination how are we making it safe to drink without removing the MERCURY?
text:
The Cape Fear Public Utility Authority ensures water quality safety
through routine testing and safety measures that include proper
filtration.

Here's where you can find out much more information about their
methodology.

http://www.cfpua.org/index.aspx?nid=111
